content.en: Optimizing distributed storage: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the performance and efficiency of distributed storage systems. These algorithms distribute data insertion load, minimize disk reads for recovery, speed up single-node failure recovery, boost degraded reads, simplify repair procedures, optimize I/O operations, and achieve optimal storage and repair mechanisms. By utilizing these algorithms, the researchers aim to enhance the throughput, reliability, and speed of data backup and recovery in distributed storage systems.
content.da: Optimering af distribueret lagring: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af distribuerede lagringssystemer. Disse algoritmer fordeler belastningen ved dataindsættelse, minimerer diskaflæsninger ved gendannelse, fremskynder gendannelse af enkeltknudepunktfejl, øger forringede aflæsninger, forenkler reparationsprocedurer, optimerer I/O-operationer og opnår optimale lagrings- og reparationsmekanismer. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre gennemløb, pålidelighed og hastighed af databackup og gendannelse i distribuerede lagringssystemer.
